alert.note: Alert for Clark; Ford; Meade (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 6:34PM CDT until August 29 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Ford County in southwestern Kansas... Northeastern Meade County in southwestern Kansas... Northwestern Clark County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 634 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Minneola, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Minneola around 650 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Fowler. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
